root.name: Buriki One
root.description: OverviewBuriki One is one of the few games released for the Hyper Neo Geo 64 hardware platform, which was only used in arcades.CharactersGai TendoMr. Karate II (Ryo Sakazaki)Rob PythonSea Yong SongJacques DucalisIvan SokolovPayak SitipitakSong XuandaoTakato SaionjiAkatsuki-MaruPatrick Van HeytingSilber (Boss)
